response.overview: Jim, a reclusive locksmith, deliberately chooses to retreat into the solace of his workshop, finding refuge in his passion for drawing. His life takes an unexpected turn when he witnesses an altercation outside his shop. Initially dismissing it, Jim is caught off guard when he unexpectedly becomes entangled in the aftermath of the romantic breakup. Confronted with the realisation that he holds a unique influence over the situation, Jim must decide whether he wants to break out of the comfort of his drawing fantasy or intervene with the real-life consequences.
response.title: The Door is Always Open
